column1: Warnakulasuriya  Hansani  Kavitha  Thisera  aged  16  years,  in  order  that  she  may  be
forced or seduced to illicit sexual intercourse, or knowing it to be likely that she will
be forced or seduced to illicit intercourse without her consent, there by committing an
offence punishable under Section 32 of the Penal Code read together with Section 357
